name: Visitor X
description:
Throughout the past weeks , residents of the  █████ area have been complaining of strange noises heard at night, such as a "metallic thump", and a "high pitched ringing" heard during the first hours of morning. A preliminary investigation found that the sounds were coming from the Conde residence, just north of the ████. Neighbours have also reported that, in some nights, a telephone keeps ringing incessantly. We have attempted to phone the house, but it seems like the number was changed without any of the city authorities being notified.

We need you to try and contact Mrs. Conde to see about these disturbances in person; also check on her wellbeing in general, and do a thorough investigation of the house.

design + programming by Gukajogu
art by Quina Barreto

This is a work in progress. The game currently has no ending or objectives.

W A S D — movement

LMB or SPACEBAR — confirm

SHIFT — run

ESC — quit

F1, F2 or F3 — change window size
